website_summaries.verdict: A super affordable manicure set with every tool you could possibly need to care for your nails at home.
pros: Includes 2 nail clippers, toenail clipper, cuticle trimmer, tweezers, scissors, single-edged push stick, v-shaped push stick, nail file, and ear pick
Stainless steel tools are decent quality and includes a synthetic leather case
cons: The case is a little flimsy and some people received tools that are different than what is advertised

website_summaries.verdict: This attractive pedicure set is a solid option for both women and men seeking a lightweight carrying case.
pros: Faux leather case offers a sleek design for carrying
Case opens quickly with the push of a button
cons: Some customers had issues with durability

customer_reviews.title: I do not know how people give this a high ...
customer_reviews.text: I do not know how people give this a high rating.This is complete junk.the toe nail clipper broke after two clips.the metal is of light gauge and not all the pieces in this kit are the same as pictured.Must be all relatives of the company.
customer_reviews.author: Michael J.

customer_reviews.title: Spend your $ on something worthwhile
customer_reviews.text: Got this with a lightening deal. So I wasted less money than otherwise. Inferior quality. One pair of good clippers is better all of these. As I type this, it sits in the garbage basket next to me. Save your money
customer_reviews.author: Flatfrog

customer_reviews.title: The case seems to be the best part. I ordered this just to maintain in ...
customer_reviews.text: This set is junk. The case seems to be the best part. I ordered this just to maintain in between pedicures but it’s not even good for that. I used the smaller of the clippers and the metal around the pivot point was stripping out. I can’t even close them properly after 1 use because the metal is worn. The cuticle nippers barely have any strength in them. Overall it’s just a cheap set that feels poorly constructed and won’t last beyond a few uses.
customer_reviews.author: G.

customer_reviews.title: Worst nail clippers I have ever purchased
customer_reviews.text: Worst nail clippers I have ever purchased. All three included clippers are too flimsy and won't cut my nails. I think I have average nails, not Superman nails of steel or anything. Scissors are extra flimsy too.
customer_reviews.author: two boys' dad

customer_reviews.title: Great Purchase
customer_reviews.text: This was an unexpectedly good sense purchase. The case is well made and the instruments are sharp, good sized and easy to handle.
customer_reviews.author: D. M. D.

customer_reviews.title: What you see pictured is NOT what I got....
customer_reviews.text: The cuticle clipper is entirely different than the one pictured in the listing....and the case now has an additional strap which holds the incorrectly pictured cuticle clipper which makes removal and replacement of the incorrectly pictured cuticle clipper needlessly difficult....they should update to an accurate picture of this set....I likely would have kept it if I received what was pictured....but even for $6.39 it is being returned...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality, metal peels off.
customer_reviews.text: This item looks nice and has many useful tools inside but the quality is VERY VERY LOW. The metal just peels off the and as a consequence I get little chards of metal in and around my nails and skin. Very unsanitary and dangerous. I'd return it if I could. Not worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Claudino Daffara

customer_reviews.title: Good enough to get the job done
customer_reviews.text: You get what you pay for. Gets the job done but the tools feel sharp when you hold it like around the area of where you’re supposed to hold the tools. The tweezer tips are so sharp that when you try to pluck hair, it cut it instead. The case is nice and great to keep everything together.
customer_reviews.author: Szmr000

customer_reviews.title: FAILED EXTENSIVE CO2 AND FIRE SMOKE TEST
customer_reviews.text: I generally dont like writing bad reviews but for something so important where people put their family and children in the line as parent I had to put the word out there. I hold the product to a direct burning fire 2 feet away and all the smoke coming up to it and it didn't go off Fire and Smoke Testing. I hold it to a vehicle exhaust for few minutes for CO2 testing and it didn't go off. Do these companies even do QC anymore? What happened to R&D departments?
customer_reviews.author: Edessa

customer_reviews.title: Worst rail clipper I’ve ever used.
customer_reviews.text: This is a super cheap and poor quality nail clipper set. I tried using the cuticle cutter, the large nail clipper, and the small nail clipper and they were all subpar. The metal handles on both the small and large nail clipper would actually bend when used and couldn’t cut a finger nail. I bought this because of the cheap price and I just assumed all nail clippers would be the same, but I guess with this set you really get what you pay for. Thank goodness for prime so it’s going back ASAP.
customer_reviews.author: big kev

customer_reviews.title: A nice sized case
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to replace some nail tools that were lost on a recent trip. This kit has all that I had before and way more! A nice sized case, and the clippers are pretty good quality (clean cut, comfortable to hold, etc). I have not used a lot of the widgets in here as I'm not that into my fingernails, but I can see how they would be useful and might experiment with some of them once I know what they are all for! :)
customer_reviews.author: Bruce T

customer_reviews.title: Clippers not strong enough to cut.
customer_reviews.text: Clippers wouldn’t cut through my nails. The lever would hit the bottom of the clippers and bottom out. I had to cut the same place twice. The levers are just not strong enough to allow the pressure needed to cut through nails. I would imagine the acrylic nails would be even worse. The case is well made and the other products work fine. The case size is as expected, it would travel well. Some items may not be allowed on a plane so check with your airline.
customer_reviews.author: lge501

customer_reviews.title: Great Except the Tweezers
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to keep in my medicine cabinet at home and I love it! Several different nail clippers and all of the accessories to go with it. This would be perfect for traveling or to throw in your purse because it’s so thin and small. It’s not a bad gift in my opinion, but it’s more of a stocking stuffer than an actual present. My only complaint is the pair of tweezers is pretty weak. If these were my only tweezers I’d be annoyed because they often cut the hair where you use them to grasp it, rather than pulling the entire hair out of your skin. So I recommend buying this, plus a tweezer set.
customer_reviews.author: Abby

customer_reviews.title: Nice set!
customer_reviews.text: I'm thrilled with my new manicure set! This is perfect for my needs. The case is sturdy and looks nice as well. The tools are sturdy and will be very useful for my needs. I'm planning on purchasing more as gifts since my set is already receiving compliments. This size is great for traveling and fits easily into luggage and also fits well into my purse. I like how well it stays closed and the closure mechanism feels very secure.
customer_reviews.author: Happy Nana

customer_reviews.title: Seller has replaced cuticle nippers w/o changing description
customer_reviews.text: When I purchased this item - the title read that it contained cuticle NIPPERS, & showed them in an image (with all of the set out of the case). However, I received cuticle scissors - AND the item underneath the snap (that looks like it'd be the cuticle nippers) is actually large, side toe nail cutters. None of the clippers were very sharp. Some of the smaller tools were so thin that they would bend without very much pressure at all. I would not buy these again or recommend them to anyone else. My daughter though has taken the kit and uses some of the tools in in. I don't think she cares for the clippers either.
customer_reviews.author: Ariel Surprises

customer_reviews.title: Worth it. Great buy, great price.
customer_reviews.text: What a gem. I got this item (3) for my toddler's teachers for Christmas and they loved it... so did I. The carrying case is beautiful and the set is complete. Stailess steel which is naturally beautiful. There are multiple tools, some which I dont even know what it is used for... HA! Honestly... you get much more for what you paid for. Great buy.
customer_reviews.author: Carol

customer_reviews.title: Bought it for the cutical trimmers :(
customer_reviews.text: My husband bought me this set for the cutical clippers. The clutch that contains all the items looks very well made and durable, but the cutical trimmers were horrible. I gave the set away to an unknowing teenager.
customer_reviews.author: Amy W.

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality!
customer_reviews.text: There is a tool for all your specific manicure and pedicure needs. I especially like that its stainless steel! The price is a steal too! it comes in an active travel case so you can have it handy at all times especially when you go and have a professional Mani/Pedi you can use your kit. I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: margaret morales

customer_reviews.title: Terrible
customer_reviews.text: Can't believe anyone is giving this 5 stars. I would honestly give it 0 if I could. Just got it in today and the quality is so bad the scissors broke the first time I tried to use them, same with the tweezers, both you can bend and the metal snaps very easily. Terrible quality, please save your money and buy something else. It's a shame that this is Amazon's choice.
customer_reviews.author: James A

customer_reviews.title: So nice, I bought it twice.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the first one as a gift and upon receiving it, realized it was so nice that I wanted one for myself. Beautiful case, easy for traveling, keeping in your car or work bag. The tools themselves are well made. They are a brushed steel instead of a shiny chrome, so it makes holding them much easier than other tools. Can't beat the price.
customer_reviews.author: Steven Jordan K

customer_reviews.title: keep your eyes on it
customer_reviews.text: I had to buy this 3 times. for "some reason" the last 2 times they grow legs and walk off somewhere never to be seen again. For everything that comes in it and for the price I was like " yeah I'll buy it again" I don't know what everything is or how to use them but the things Ido use are excellent
customer_reviews.author: Joseph L. Newson Jr.

customer_reviews.title: A lot more heavy duty than I was expecting!
customer_reviews.text: I've gotten a nail care set like this before, the pieces were flimsy and cheaply made but got the job done. I was expecting the same quality when I ordered this one. I was VERY pleasantly surprised seeing the quality of the set- everything in it is way more heavy duty than I expected! Definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Bethany

customer_reviews.title: Will probably be buying a second one in the near future.  Hey, just bought one for my husband so he doesn't steal mine!
customer_reviews.text: Product has everything you would want in a manicure set. Nice tools logically arranged in a beautiful snap-shut case. Will probably be buying a second one in the near future
customer_reviews.author: Chili Cheese Dog

customer_reviews.title: Cannot use even once.
customer_reviews.text: Instantly broken. Got this today. Pulled the nail clippers out, instantly broke. Same with the second. And the third. Does not work, don’t waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: Natasha Johnson

customer_reviews.title: They belong in the trash!!
customer_reviews.text: These are very flimsy and cheap crap. They dont cut nails without breaking them or chipping them or not at all. The Walmart ones during xmas that are like 3.00 are way better then these. It comes in a nice case bit the price is not worth it if they dont work.
customer_reviews.author: BUBBA

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply made
customer_reviews.text: Cheaply made. The cuticle clippers are too thick. All the tools are too thick and easily bendable (not sure if these are stainless steel). Not too happy, I had to go and buy another mani set.
customer_reviews.author: Sunshine sunny

customer_reviews.title: Broke after two uses.
customer_reviews.text: I got this set for my spouse. He used it twice and then it broke.. he was just about to start cutting his nails and all he did was open the cutters and the back spring off and two pieces went everywhere. They are just cheaply made.
customer_reviews.author: Corri Glispey

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money
customer_reviews.text: This set is useless. The tweezers are such poor quality you can’t pluck a hair or pickup anything with them. The rest are just frail and not worth what was spent on them. Total waste of money. More was spent on the case than the tools inside.
customer_reviews.author: Poppinfresh

customer_reviews.title: My 11 year-old daughter reports that the manicure set is garbage. The very first time she used the nail ...
customer_reviews.text: A "dollar store" purchase that ended up costing me 8 bucks and change. I recently found myself needing to make an additional $9 or so purchase to obtain free postage and found this Manicure Pedicure set on the Amazon deals page. Fast delivery - no complaint there. Cheap looking case. Ten piece manicure set has an extreme "cheap look" to it. My 11 year-old daughter reports that the manicure set is garbage. The very first time she used the nail clippers, they broke. Now what to do with a manicure/pedicure nail clipper set when the mail tool contained in the ten piece kit is broken... Bill Lewis Fort Lauderdale, Broward County, Florida.
customer_reviews.author: William E. Lewis, Jr. - Fort Lauderdale, Florida

customer_reviews.title: Cheap quality
customer_reviews.text: For $8.99 i suppose it is a manicure set. But there is no stiffness to the "steel" they use. The clippers are so thin that one can easily squeeze the ends together during use. If you have tough nails, these are simply going to give you a hard time. There are much better options to be had for just a little bit more. Save yourself and just pay an extra couple of bucks. I will be returning these as I'm unsatisfied with the product.
customer_reviews.author: Carl W.

customer_reviews.title: More 'springy' than 'clip'
customer_reviews.text: Both the Toe & Finger nail clippers have too much 'spring' in them when closed all the way. Thought they were supposed to 'clip' at that point? Instead, feels like I'm trying to clip rubber at the end of the cut?? I have very healthy (read: strong, thick) nails, but have never had a problem with "Name Brand" clippers doing their job. Might be simply the handle meets the 2-part clipper base too soon when pushing down? Given the price, I'm going to get out the pliers & bend the handle up a bit at the place where they 'fulcrum' for a higher angle to see if this improves performance.
customer_reviews.author: Piper's mom

customer_reviews.title: Amazing and sturdy!
customer_reviews.text: Honestly, this is the best thing I've ever bought. It has everything you will ever need for your nails, and for the price that you can get just 1 pair somewhere else! The best part is, everything is sturdy and functional and I've had it for about a year and it hasn't broken! Overall, I highly recommend this if your an at-home nail fanatic, or just need something to keep them looking fresh.
customer_reviews.author: Adrianna

customer_reviews.title: Bad quality
customer_reviews.text: The materials on this product are very low quality. Don’t buy this. Some of the items don’t even clip properly.
customer_reviews.author: Hidaner Ferrer

customer_reviews.title: Fingernail clippers that can’t clip?!
customer_reviews.text: Three things I can never find in my house when I need them. Tweezers. Phillips screwdriver and fingernail clippers. I bought these and warned the family serious repercussions if they were to use them. Well...I am giving them to charity. These things couldn’t cut a fingernail even after a hot shower. The metal is made of cheap Chinese aluminum. Horrible product even at 10 bucks.
customer_reviews.author: Headcount

customer_reviews.title: Wanted to love it.
customer_reviews.text: Brought this manicure/pedicure set to the nail salon and the people had a difficult time with these items. They said everything was very dull with it. They did the best the could but had to use some of their own tools which defeats the purpose of me bringing my own.
customer_reviews.author: Crissy Hendrix

customer_reviews.title: christmas gift
customer_reviews.text: I know you want a in-depth review of it inner works and how its enrich my life and brought my family closer together or how I get laid more. uh nope read the next one Merry Christmas
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don't Work Well.
customer_reviews.text: Quality is wanting. Well wanting. Doesn't clip cleanly and you can kind of feel the cheap metal, which gave me a nails-on-a-chalkboard feeling... After I returned these, I purchased a similar set from a company called Corewill on Amazon. Better look, and FAR superior quality and functionality.
customer_reviews.author: Jean-Patrick Hook

customer_reviews.title: Junk look for something better
customer_reviews.text: Horible quality manicure set I got this as a gift for Xmas and I just herd back that it’s basically junk. The nail clippers won’t cut anything the other took are even worse the best item out the package is the case the rest is junk. Which is sad case it looked so nice and now I feel bad for the family member I got it for as a gift.
customer_reviews.author: Drew tuTWENTY

customer_reviews.title: Not for Me
customer_reviews.text: I think you get what you pay for. The case was the only thing worthwhile. The instruments were cheap and flimsy looking. Didn't care for it at all. Glad it didn't cost much. What a waste in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: laydeejay

customer_reviews.title: Good for the money!
customer_reviews.text: Only complaint, the case. I used super glue and no issues anymore. The material was trying to peel up, nothing major though. The clippers a d everything else are great. They cut evenly and are sharp. My wife has used practically everything, I just stick to the clippers. I love a good set and these are the ticket, they work great!
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan A.

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: Pretty much junk. Scissors broke on first use. Got an email from supplier who wanted a 'review' before this one, and I got NO response. You get what you pay for...
customer_reviews.author: Richard M. Wagner

customer_reviews.title: Horrible
customer_reviews.text: I've purchased similar products at similar prices in the past that were good quality and durable. The same CANNOT be said for this item. All the tools are very Cheaply made, the case almost broke the very first time I tried to open it. As stated in other reviews, many of these tools do not work for their intended purpose, if at all. I will be buying a different set and will definitely not buy from this seller in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Angela Warren

customer_reviews.title: New Manufacture? Bad Job.
customer_reviews.text: First off, throw the tweezers in the trash. if you missed the trash try again. The tweezers are trash, but you're in luck because the clippers actually act as tweezers because they don't clip....at all. they just squeeze. in the kit every clipper was INCREDIBLY dull. I actually re-purchased this kit after owning an incredible version 4 years ago. I guess they cut cost and their product suffered greatly. Bad Job. SAD.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy W. Christie

customer_reviews.title: Too Small to Use
customer_reviews.text: This kit looks nice, but other than the nail clippers, the other tools are way too small to use. I included a photo of the cuticle pushers next to a ruler and a standard nail file for comparison. I have small hands, but still can't get a grip on these tools. Less than 3 inches long, and about the diameter/thickness of a paper clip. Putting this straight into the donation bag.
customer_reviews.author: Quiltaholic

customer_reviews.title: Save your money.
customer_reviews.text: This product is alluring because the price is so cheap. Heads up...the product is cheaply made. All the tools are worthless and the container is not much better. Save your money. Go to a drug store and get what you need.
customer_reviews.author: Cywalsh

customer_reviews.title: I wouldn't buy this again
customer_reviews.text: This manicure set almost immediately started falling apart and now the case doesn't even function. All of the actual manicure tools work well and are sturdy, but the cute case is absolute trash. Save your money and buy a different kit.
customer_reviews.author: Karin Z.

customer_reviews.title: Review
customer_reviews.text: you really do cut the nails but as when cutting leaves them as sharp if you do not file them with something you can scratch as the razors of the nail clipper are not very even
customer_reviews.author: Jose Roman Nava

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: Comes with everything it says but it's super super cheap. I like the container but everything inside it is super flimsy and doesn't work. Just spend a little more $$ and get something quality. I threw mine out.
customer_reviews.author: Casey

customer_reviews.title: Use your money for a better product
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed because the quality is pretty poor. I know I paid $10 for a set of some manicure and pedicure tools, but I would better choose something else. It does the job, but it is hard to use
customer_reviews.author: Elena L

customer_reviews.title: Cheap
customer_reviews.text: I rarely return items but this was returned 2 days after receiving. Clippers broke the first time I tried to use them
customer_reviews.author: THubbs

customer_reviews.title: A Must Have & Affordable
customer_reviews.text: This is everything you need to do a manicure or pedicure and more. Tools no one has ever mentioned to me that I could use was in this kit and it comes with this stylish case.
customer_reviews.author: Shakisha7

customer_reviews.title: So happy with this
customer_reviews.text: So happy with this! I didn’t realize it had smiley faces on some of the tools :) I love it. Good tools, sharp, easy to grip.
customer_reviews.author: webgirl4

customer_reviews.title: Missing a piece off a trimmer
customer_reviews.text: Received item today and there was a piece missing from one of the trimmers which makes the trimmer unusable. Not worth driving 30 min to a ups center to return.
customer_reviews.author: Dobbie

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase
customer_reviews.text: VERY pleased with this purchase. The manicure set is nicely made. Implements are of sturdy steel construction and the case is attractive. It's nice and compact so perfect for travel. Instruments are sharp
customer_reviews.author: Karl E. O. Fraser

customer_reviews.title: The compact case is high quality and perfect for home
customer_reviews.text: The compact case is high quality and perfect for home, office, or purse. All the tools are great but the cuticle trimmers could be a bit sharper. Overall, it's a great buy and I purchased a bunch for my sisters and sisters- in -laws for the holidays...thinking ahead. Can't beat the price!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: A LOT for the money. Had this set for a few years and left them behind on a trip. Liked enough to buy again. With that in mind, the nail clippers are a bid awkward to use. Need to get into a difficult angle to cut. Would be super if a small cheat sheet were inserted to show uses of the various pieces.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Are not sharp
customer_reviews.text: instruments are thick (hard to work around nail cuticles and under nails. Sharpness is great if you want to cut butter. Regret that I purchased 3 before I tried them out. oh well live and learn.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Very high quality set, tight tweezers, sturdy nail clippers, includes so many manicure tools, and the case closes perfectly and looks very nice, I’m very happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: domrie

customer_reviews.title: ManiPedi Set on the go!
customer_reviews.text: Happy that I made this purchase! The kid has everything you need in it. I love how the case comes in different designs. If you like me, and find yourself needing a file while out or Clippers, this is a perfect day to fit in your purse.
customer_reviews.author: Tasha Harrison

customer_reviews.title: Low quality
customer_reviews.text: The outside case breaks open (does not close properly) after only some use and the little scissor does not cut and the tweezers ends do not meet so not good for anything..
customer_reviews.author: Grace Lee

customer_reviews.title: Do NOT waste your money.
customer_reviews.text: complete crap. sure, the tools "look cool" and its a great price. all the tools are super dull. the fingernail clippers bend the nail as it cuts. the mini scissors rip your hair out, not cut them. I contacted the seller at their request, and they told me, "well, you got your product on time, you can deal with Amazon now".
customer_reviews.author: Ed

customer_reviews.title: Nice case but low quality tools
customer_reviews.text: This set has a really nice case but the tools inside are of poor quality. In my opinion it would be better to spend a little more on a couple of essential tools than to get a bunch of lower quality ones.
customer_reviews.author: JSW

customer_reviews.title: They work great
customer_reviews.text: They are a wonderful product they do a great job Beware of the case to keep it in your bathroom in the steam the glue will come undone from the metal
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Cheap quality!
customer_reviews.text: Don’t buy! I should have read reviews! Cheap quality. I need sturdy nail cutters that will leave a smooth cut.
customer_reviews.author: G.E.

customer_reviews.title: Crappy
customer_reviews.text: I have to agree with others, toenail clippers broke the first time I used them, cuticle trimmers are dull.
customer_reviews.author: Feisty

customer_reviews.title: It does the job
customer_reviews.text: Liked this small box, it has what you need, i’ve been using it for the last few months. It’s a nice tool but would not replace professional help in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: J.F.

customer_reviews.title: Not as noce as it looks!
customer_reviews.text: I was disappointed with this item. Two of the tools were poorly made. The case is wonderful and a plus since my last name begins with W but the clippers and such are crudley made.
customer_reviews.author: Debra A. Wachtstetter

customer_reviews.title: Ok set
customer_reviews.text: It's an ok set. Lots of needed nail tools but the cuticle cutter is dull and the cuticle clipper doesn't clip just punch the skin but doesn't cut. Those are 2 of the main things I use.
customer_reviews.author: Lady Tea

customer_reviews.title: FAIL
customer_reviews.text: The first thing I did was try to use the nail clippers, and they couldn't even cut my fingernails.
customer_reviews.author: Specseek

customer_reviews.title: Manicure Pedicure Set Nail Clippers - 10 Piece Stainless Steel Manicure Kit
customer_reviews.text: Manicure Pedicure Set Nail Clippers - 10 Piece Stainless Steel Manicure Kit Price is great for the quality of the kit!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Dbean

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: This set is a nice size to fit in a purse, but is poor quality. The clippers are stiff and hard to use, and after only a few times a piece snapped off while I was cutting my fingernails.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie S

customer_reviews.title: Everything you need
customer_reviews.text: I bought this trip for traveling overseas. It has more than the things that I need but you can't beat the price. So far nothing has broken.
customer_reviews.author: Muad'Dib

customer_reviews.title: Just pay more for better.
customer_reviews.text: Well, the cuticle cutter broke the second I tried to use it. Everything besides the fingernail clipper seems unnecessary or faulty. Price reflects the quality. :(
customer_reviews.author: Sarah R.

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: Where to start? This product is incredibly low quality. The little case doesn't close properly, the little latch seems like it will break after just few uses, and the implements themselves are terrible. For example, the nail clippers are so dull right out of the package that I couldn't even snip a little hangnail.
customer_reviews.author: Jenn

customer_reviews.title: It's ok.
customer_reviews.text: The case is pretty subpar, there were strings hanging from it and it's really hard to get some of the tools back in. I didn't get this for the tweezers, but I tried them, and they are flimsy to the point of barely functioning. Otherwise, I like the pack and I'm glad to have it.
customer_reviews.author: Sophia

customer_reviews.title: Inexpensive to have handy
customer_reviews.text: Clippers are not very sharp and precise. Very inexpensively construction. Got what I paid for!
customer_reviews.author: G. Markum

customer_reviews.title: High Quality Product very nice manicure set.
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this for my mom she is 80 and still does her own nails. It is a high qaulity case and manicure set. I would order again from this company. It arrive in 3 days of order.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Packaged very nicely, look good though they don’t perform clean and ...
customer_reviews.text: Packaged very nicely, look good though they don’t perform clean and crisp cuts, the precision of the metal is off.
customer_reviews.author: LB

customer_reviews.title: Clippers don't cut.
customer_reviews.text: The first clippers I used can't cut at all I would never recommend this set. I'm returning it and buying the set in the gold case. It has much better reviews,wish I would have read them,before ordering.
customer_reviews.author: CKM

customer_reviews.title: Average
customer_reviews.text: The case is nice and it comes with a good variety of tools, but the clippers aren’t very sharp at all.
customer_reviews.author: A.M.

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money or time
customer_reviews.text: Nothing worked. The scissors didn't cut and the nail clippers just tear your nails.
customer_reviews.author: TAT2dFRE4K

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money
customer_reviews.text: Terrible quality. The metal on the nail clipper is so thin that it broke the 1st time I use it. The material used to hold the implements in is so inferior that after taking them out the 1 st time, they have never again stayed in place
customer_reviews.author: reviewer

customer_reviews.title: Small pieces big holes
customer_reviews.text: Not the easiest to deal with. Most of the tools just fall out of their designated spots. Good product though
customer_reviews.author: Sassy & Sweet

customer_reviews.title: Do NOT waste your money
customer_reviews.text: The clippers in this kit are so cheap the handles bend before it cuts your nails.
customer_reviews.author: Chupes1970

customer_reviews.title: Wife loves it
customer_reviews.text: Wife loves it. We've had it 6 months or so and it's holding up nicely. Good value.
customer_reviews.author: wookie1120

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful case and sturdy implements. I gave as stocking stuffer to my older children and they were pleased
customer_reviews.author: AJ

customer_reviews.title: Teenage girl Approved
customer_reviews.text: Great for home or travel. My daughter loves the packaging also. Now I have to get one for the wife as they fight over it.....
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: Some of the tools are good and offers a lot for the price
customer_reviews.text: Some of the tools are good and offers a lot for the price. However the clippers are kind of dull and just poorer quality. It was very inexpensive though so not a bad purchase given that.
customer_reviews.author: A.Shop

customer_reviews.title: Too dull to use!
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my caregiver for Christmas. She was so excited. I was so embarrassed when she took the cuticle cutters out and they were so dull they couldnt even cut any skin! Same thing happened with the little scissors...they wouldnt cut hair on her arm. The case is nice, but the tools are unusable. Save your money.
customer_reviews.author: J. Lorraine

customer_reviews.title: Great quality for this price!
customer_reviews.text: I needed a quick set to shape my nails as I forgot to bring mine when I moved to the states and I love this. Everything works as intended. And the bag is really nice. My only concern is that the tweezers are kinda too sharp for their purpose so be careful not to grab your skin with them as they do cut!
customer_reviews.author: Ragnhild

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for a manly, man. He loved it!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my Mom's boyfriend, for his birthday. He is a man who works with his hands for a living. Needless to say, these are all well made, have a good weight to them. Perfect for a manly, man. He loved it!
customer_reviews.author: Audra

customer_reviews.title: Great to Have
customer_reviews.text: I'm glad I got it. It truly has everything I need. I can't afford to get my manicures anymore so I have been doing my nails myself. It's nice and compact. Worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Kendra L. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Stocking stuffer
customer_reviews.text: Every adult got this in their stocking. I hope they like them. I know I sure do.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie Smith Howell

customer_reviews.title: Great kit for your hands
customer_reviews.text: Very please with my manicure kit, overall it brings all you need, but no small mirrors like other manicure sets which is why I gave it a 4 stars. The product's quality seems good, and truly enjoy the leather feel and looks of the kit.
customer_reviews.author: Miguel Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Fine...
customer_reviews.text: The case is great (though would be better with elastic holders) but the clippers are all cheap. I do NOT recommend. I guess you get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money
customer_reviews.text: This set is garbage. The fact that someone tries to pass this off as a quality product is shameful.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Robert Ramirez

customer_reviews.title: Fell apart
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had this for a little less than a year, I’ve never traveled with it and it usually just stays in the bathroom drawer. All the accessories that come in the kit have worked great and I’ve had no issues. However the whole case has COMPLETELY fallen apart. I don’t recommenced this product you’d be better off getting a case that actually stays intact.
customer_reviews.author: Kayla

customer_reviews.title: Don't let the affordability of this set fool you!
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the best quality sets I've ever used! I will buy this in the future for gifts and when I lose pieces to my own set!
customer_reviews.author: Val

customer_reviews.title: Great deal!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased one for each of my sons, and one for my husband. Case could be a little sturdier but they were great sets.
customer_reviews.author: Caherbst

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: I was seduced by the low price. This kit consists of cheap, stamped-metal tools that won't do the job. Spend some money and get some real tools.
customer_reviews.author: J. D. Crutchfield

product_meta.title: Manicure Pedicure Set Nail Clippers - 10 Piece Stainless Steel Manicure Kit - tools for nail, Cutter Kits -Perfect gift for women, men Includes Cuticle Remover with Portable Travel Case
product_meta.description:
Size:Kit 2

HAVE YOU BEEN LOOKING FOR A COMPLETE MANICURE AND PEDICURE NAIL CLIPPER SET THAT IS BOTH AFFORDABLE AND HIGH QUALITY?
BEAUTY BON® HAS IT ALL AND MORE!

What's the easiest way to come across as neat, clean, and professional? It's right at your fingertips. Keep your nails stylish and ready
with a quick clip or a nice mani-pedi with Beauty Bon®'s 10 Piece Manicure and Pedicure Set! This beautiful 10 piece set comes in an
intricately adorned decorative box with a super easy to open lid, so you don't have to worry about messing up your manicure when you reach for your nail tools!
All you have to do is press the convenient button located on the box and it opens very easily.
This professional grade manicure set has all the tools you need to make an Instagram-worthy manicure and pedicure.
Treat yourself to a home spa day today, complete with a mani-pedi!

WHAT YOU RECEIVE WITH YOUR PURCHASE

This is a 10 Piece Manicure and Pedicure Nail Clippers Collection

• 1 x Cuticle Scissors

• 1 x Nail Scissors

• 1 x Nail Nippers

• 1 x Cuticle Nippers

• 1 x Tweezers

• 1 x Splinter Tweezers

• 1 x Nail Cleaner

• 1 x Sapphire Nail File

• 1 x Toe Nail Clipper

• 1 x Cuticle Remover

All of our beauty nail products are made of 100% Stainless Steel. This is important because stainless steel is one of the strongest
and longest lasting materials out there, and is easily disinfected for years of clean and safe use. High-quality construction means
no snagging or squeaking when using any of these tools, and a comfort during use.

WARNING!

Some products sold in this store contain chemicals known to the State of california to cause cancer, birth defects or other reproductive harm.
feature_bullets: PORTABLE & LIGHTWEIGHT: The Beauty Bon 10 Piece Nail Set comes with a portable synthetic leather case that is easily opened with a push of a button. It is also very lightweight so you can carry it with you in your bag everyday or pack it with you when you go traveling.

10 PIECE MANICURE AND PEDICURE NAIL SET: Included in this 10 Piece set are two nail clippers, one toenail clipper, one cuticle trimmer, one tweezer one pair of beauty scissors , one single-edged push stick, one v-shaped push stick, one nail file and one ear pick.
MADE OF 100% STAINLESS STEEL: These nail clipping tools are all made with 100% Stainless Steel . This set is strong and built to last. You will get your money's worth with this set and more.

INTRICATELY DESIGNED CASE: The 10 Piece NailCare Set comes in an intricately designed case that is both stylish and functional. This case is easy to open as well, all that you have to do is press the button and it opens up quickly.

100% SATISFACTION GUARANTEED: Beauty Bon guarantees that you will love our products. We strive to make only the best beauty applicators, aids, nail clippers and more--at the most affordable prices for our customers!
